suite.name: Post Product

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=pixel, url=Http://pixel-api:3333, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Post Request
kw.doc: Send a POST request on the session object found using the given `alias`
kw.msg: POST Response : url=http://pixel-api:3333/auth status=200, reason=OK body={ "token": "eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpZCI6MSwiZXhwaXJlIjoiMjAyMC0wNS0wN1QyMDowNTozNy4yNTYrMDA6MDAifQ.-mXmL8BlLvpFttdG0v4TZog9dfxXKc6HxKfyRsJICMM", "expire": "2020-05-07T20:05:37.256+00:00", "userId": 1 }

kw.name: Convert To String
kw.doc: Converts the given item to a Unicode string.

kw.name: Get File
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.
kw.msg: ${file} = { "title": "Donkey Kong", "category": "Super Nintendo", "producers": ["Nintendo", "Rare"], "price": "199.99", "description": "É pura diversão com este clássico de plataforma 2D.", ...

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.
kw.msg: ${payload} = {u'category': u'Super Nintendo', u'description': u'\xc9 pura divers\xe3o com este cl\xe1ssico de plataforma 2D.', u'title': u'Donkey Kong', u'price': u'199.99', u'cover': u'donkey-kong.jpg', u'produce...

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Post Request
kw.doc: Send a POST request on the session object found using the given `alias`

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.
